section.name: Commercial Support for OpenMeetings
section.p: There are few companies offering complex services for OpenMeetings, including code support, development, integration and bug fixing

ul.li: unipro.ru run by Maxim Solodovnik, Irina Arkhipets and other team
samoo.es provides support for the Sakai Plugin

section.p: Please write to om.unipro@gmail.com to get Unipro support
As well as additionally for hosting offers:

ul.li: om-hosting.com Cloud based hosting for OpenMeetings

section.p: There are more companies offering installation, customization, hosting, conferencing and support services. You can add yourself to the wiki page.
Want to get listed here? Become a committer.
